UE02A03GeometrischeFormen

Class Schneeflocke

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • UE02A03GeometrischeFormen.Schneeflocke

  • public class Schneeflocke
extends javafx.application.Application
    Implementation of a snowflake-shaped figure being drawn on a JavaFX-Canvas. Thus being four crossed lines drawn from the same origin x-y-coordinates. Then being drawn again on each end-point of either of these lines with a length of 0.33px

    • Nested Class Summary

      • drawShapes

        private void drawShapes(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc,
                        double posX,
                        double posY,
                        double laenge,
                        double a,
                        int n)
        Recursive Method, which draws a snowflake-shaped figure until recursive depth is reached.
        Parameters:
        gc - Graphics-Element to be drawn on.
        posX - X-Coordinate of the current recursive stack.
        posY - Y-Coordinate of the current recursive stack.
        laenge - length of the lines to be drawn.
        a - Starting angle to be used to rotate the current shape.
        n - Recursive depth counter.
